name: Run Ninja Lite
description:
The all addictive Run Ninja game is Here!!!

Just Tap to make the ninja flip. Swing around different levels and avoid hitting the
enemy!

Hit the power ups instead! It will protect the ninja for 5 seconds when you hit the
enemy. Also you will be flying faster and get more points!

Run Ninja game is great for every age. Young and old alike, can compete against each other.

Families can enjoy and have loads of fun with this game.

### UNIQUE FEATURES ###

√ Beautiful design
√ Challenging achievements
√ Fun to play for everyone
√ Leaderboards
√ Great music track

This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges
may apply.

## Important Message for Parents ###

This game may include:

- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of
13.

- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to
browse any web page.

Download Run Ninja now and have fun!!
